song.title: Stronger (There is Love)
song.lyrics:
[INTRO] .D E A
[1] . D E A There is Love that came for us . D E A Humbled to a sinner's cross . D E F#m You broke my shame and sinfulness . D E A You rose again victorious
[2] . D E A/C# Faithfulness none can deny . D E A/C# Through the storm and through the fire . D E F#m There is truth that sets me free .E D E A Jesus Christ who lives in me
[C] . A E You are stronger, You are stronger . F#m D Sin is broken, You have saved me || . A E It is written, Christ is risen . D E A Jesus You are Lord of all --- ; Order 1 2 c 3 c b(x4) c(x2) [3] . D E A No beginning and no end . D E A Youâ€™re my hope and my defense . D E F#m You came to seek and save the lost . E D E A You paid it all upon the cross
[INSTRUMENTAL] .D F#m E A
[B] . D F#m So let Your Name be lifted higher . A A/C# Be lifted higher . E E/G# Be lifted higher
song.author: Hillsong Live
